reviews.text: The Grand Sunset Hotel was a beautiful hotel at the perfect location for Karon Beach. Beach is a 2 minute walk and there are plenty of restaurants, bars and spas also within walking distance. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. Would definitely recommend this hotel for anyone travelling to Karon Beach.
reviews.title: Beautiful Hotel

reviews.text: This hotel is a little gem. Spotlessly clean and sleek with all mod cons and an excellent rooftop pool.
reviews.title: Loved it so much we stayed twice!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: On our initial visit we were upgraded to to the deluxe room due to the standard room being overbooked. This was on the open side of the building looking towards the beach and the room could not have been better. Couldn't fault it at all except that there should be another mirror in the bedroom or lounge as only in the bathroom.
reviews.title: The BEST hotel ever! Clean, convenient & very very friendly staff!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Breakfast is pretty good for a hotel of this class and the staff throughout the hotel are helpful and attentive.
reviews.title: Great Location - Great Hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Tucked back from the main road along the beach this hotel benefits from the Shielding of the BaumanCasa hotel in front of it as you get virtually no road noise at all. Rooftop pool is funky with nice plush sunbeds and furniture and nice view.
reviews.title: Good 3.5 star hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We were only here for 3 days en route to Phi Phi and liked it so much we returned and stayed another three nights on our way back.
reviews.title: Clean hotel with nice pool

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Great hotel, great service the staff very friendly and helpful, we stayed here 4 night end of November. rooms were very smart all new and very clean, roof pool was fantastic with fabulous views of the sun setting too. Its fair to say that there is building work going on nearby but it does not spoil your enjoyment of the place, we heard no noise from it and were actually amazed at their workmanship and often stopped and watched them work, and the work when we left was almost completed I should think that new hotel would be open now they work so fast!
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel would stay again.

reviews.text: The Grand Sunset hotel was short walk from beach it is accessed down a side street but no more then couple of hundred metres from beach to the hotel door. When we stayed there the restaurant in the hotel was not yet open so can't comment on their food but I should expect like the rest of the hotel it should be of an excellent standard.
reviews.title: Great service !

reviews.text: Karon is a lovely friendly place with just enough to keep you occupied plenty of restaurants and bars, nearby kata is also lovely too.
reviews.title: Great location + great service = Great stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And if your looking for a more lively time Patong is a short ride by tuk tuk or taxi. We also found getting around the island easier while staying in Karon.
reviews.title: Brilliant Hotel - Awesome Service

reviews.text: This is a great hotel, all new and super clean, and with a fantastic service. Specially the day receptionist called Oiewas very friendly, and provided me with all the info I needed, and always sweet and smiling.
reviews.title: Good value
